text: 1.  Yesterday the sun was still shining at 5:15 and I was like OH MY GOSH! What is this!!! Felt so good. 2. I want to make these southern butter crackers! 3. I’m always ridiculously late to trends and I can’t help but think how cute so many of these bag charms are, 4. Trader Joe’s customer choice awards!! 5. My mid life crisis is wanting to get more piercings in my ears. Could be worse? 6. Where all to apply the 80/20 rule. Love this. 7. TV Things! I watched the OJ doc on netflix and An Update on Our Family on Max! 8. Pretty sure my favorite Grammys look of the night was Cardi B! I want to wear a giant tiger dress. 9. Booktok’s most talked about books last year. Interesting!
html:
1.  Yesterday the sun was still shining at 5:15 and I was like OH MY GOSH! What is this!!! Felt so good.

2. I want to make these southern butter crackers!

3. I’m always ridiculously late to trends and I can’t help but think how cute so many of these bag charms are,

4. Trader Joe’s customer choice awards!!

5. My mid life crisis is wanting to get more piercings in my ears. Could be worse?

6. Where all to apply the 80/20 rule. Love this.

7. TV Things! I watched the OJ doc on netflix and An Update on Our Family on Max!

8. Pretty sure my favorite Grammys look of the night was Cardi B! I want to wear a giant tiger dress.

9. Booktok’s most talked about books last year. Interesting!
